288 , Pressed = 1
289 , Repeat = 2
290 };
291

293 {

295 uint32_t code;
296 Xenium::KeyState state;
297 };
298
299 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_Shift = 0x00000001;
300 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_CapsLock = 0x00000002;
301 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_Control = 0x00000004;
302 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_Alt = 0x00000008;
303 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_NumLock = 0x00000010;
304 static constexpr uint32_t KeyModifier_Meta = 0x00000040;

1546 class XeniumErrorCategory_
1547 : public std::error_category
1548 {
1549 public:
1556 constexpr XeniumErrorCategory_() noexcept
1557 {
1558 }
1559
1565 const char* name() const noexcept override
1566 {
1567 return "zakero.Xenium";
1568 }
1569
1576 std::string message(int condition
1577 ) const noexcept override
1578 {
1579 switch(condition)
1580 {
1581#define X(name_, val_, mesg_) \
1582 case val_: return mesg_;
1583 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR_DATA
1584#undef X
1585 }
1586
1587 return "Unknown error condition";
1588 }
1589 } XeniumErrorCategory;

1602 Xenium::LambdaPointMm LambdaPointMm_DoNothing = [](const Xenium::PointMm&, const Xenium::KeyModifier&) noexcept {};

1611 Xenium::LambdaSizePixel LambdaSizePixel_DoNothing = [](const Xenium::SizePixel&) noexcept {};
1625 std::error_code convertConnectionError(int xcb_error_code
1626 ) noexcept
1627 {
1628 switch(xcb_error_code)
1629 {
1630 case 0:
1631 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_None);
1632
1633 case XCB_CONN_ERROR:
1634 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Connection_Failed);
1635
1636 case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_EXT_NOTSUPPORTED:
1637 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Extension_Not_Supported);
1638
1639 case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_MEM_INSUFFICIENT:
1640 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Not_Enough_Memory);
1641
1642 case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_REQ_LEN_EXCEED:
1643 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Request_Too_Long);
1644
1645 case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_PARSE_ERR:
1646 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Invalid_Display_Name);
1647
1648 case XCB_CONN_CLOSED_INVALID_SCREEN:
1649 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Invalid_Screen);
1650
1651 default:
1652 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Unknown);
1653 }
1654 }
1655
1656
1669 template<class Type
1670 >
1671 std::error_code validateMinMax(const Type& min
1672 , const Type& max
1673 ) noexcept
1674 {
1675 if((min.width < 0)
1676 || (min.height < 0)
1677 || (max.width < 0)
1678 || (max.height < 0)
1679 )
1680 {
1681 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
1682 }
1683
1684 if((max.width > 0)
1685 && (min.width > max.width)
1686 )
1687 {
1688 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Minimum_Size_Greater_Than_Maximum_Size);
1689 }
1690
1691 if((max.height > 0)
1692 && (min.height > max.height)
1693 )
1694 {
1695 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_Minimum_Size_Greater_Than_Maximum_Size);
1696 }
1697
1698 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Xenium::Error_None);
1699 }
1700}

2471
2472
2498Xenium* Xenium::connect(const std::string& display
2499 , std::error_code& error
2500 ) noexcept
2501{
2502 const char* display_name = nullptr;
2503
2504 if(display.empty() == false)
2505 {
2506 display_name = display.c_str();
2507 }
2508
2509 // --- Connect To X11 Server --- //
2510 int screen_number = 0;
2511 xcb_connection_t* connection = xcb_connect(display_name, &screen_number);
2512 int xcb_error = xcb_connection_has_error(connection);
2513 if(xcb_error)
2514 {
2515 error = convertConnectionError(xcb_error);
2516
2517 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2518
2519 return nullptr;
2520 }
2521
2522 // --- Xenium --- //
2523 Xenium* xenium = new Xenium();
2524
2525 error = xenium->init(connection, screen_number);
2526 if(error)
2527 {
2528 delete xenium;
2529
2530 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2531
2532 return nullptr;
2533 }
2534
2535 xenium->eventLoopStart();
2536
2537 error = xenium->atomInit();
2538 if(error)
2539 {
2540 delete xenium;
2541
2542 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2543
2544 return nullptr;
2545 }
2546
2547 error = ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
2548
2549 return xenium;
2550}
2551
2552
2560void Xenium::disconnect() noexcept
2561{
2562 this->setup = nullptr;
2563
2564 if(connection)
2565 {
2566 xcb_disconnect(this->connection);
2567 connection = nullptr;
2568 }
2569
2570 return;
2571}

2574// {{{ Initialization
2575
2581std::error_code Xenium::init(xcb_connection_t* connection
2582 , int screen_number
2583 ) noexcept
2584{
2585 this->connection = connection;
2586
2587 // --- X11 Server Setup Information --- //
2588 this->setup = xcb_get_setup(this->connection);
2589 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_VAR(to_string(*setup));
2590
2591 // --- Find the current screen --- //
2592 xcb_screen_iterator_t screen_iterator = xcb_setup_roots_iterator(this->setup);
2593
2594 for(int i = 0; i < screen_number; i++)
2595 {
2596 xcb_screen_next(&screen_iterator);
2597 }
2598
2599 this->screen = screen_iterator.data;
2600 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_VAR(to_string(*screen));
2601
2602 // --- XXB Extension --- //
2603 std::error_code error;
2604
2605 error = xkbInit();
2606 if(error)
2607 {
2608 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2609
2610 return error;
2611 }
2612
2613 // --- Initialize The Internals --- //
2614 error = randrInit();
2615 if(error)
2616 {
2617 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2618
2619 return error;
2620 }
2621
2622 error = outputInit();
2623 if(error)
2624 {
2625 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
2626
2627 return error;
2628 }
2629
2630 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
2631}

2639//#define ZAKERO_XENIUM__ENABLE_THREAD_SCHEDULER
2640
2647void Xenium::eventLoopStart() noexcept
2648{
2649 event_loop = std::jthread(&Xenium::eventLoop, this);
2650
2651 while(event_loop_is_running.load() == false)
2652 {
2653 // Wait for the thread to start
2654 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::nanoseconds(42));
2655 }
2656
2657 //#ifdef ZAKERO_XENIUM__ENABLE_THREAD_SCHEDULER
2658 //int policy = SCHED_FIFO;
2659 //int priority_min = sched_get_priority_min(policy);
2660 //int priority_max = sched_get_priority_max(policy);
2661
2662 //sched_param sched =
2663 //{ .sched_priority = (priority_min + priority_max) / 2
2664 //};
2665
2666 //pthread_setschedparam(event_loop.native_handle(), policy, &sched);
2667 //#endif
2668}
2669
2670
2678void Xenium::eventLoop(std::stop_token thread_token
2679 , Xenium* xenium
2680 ) noexcept
2681{
2682 const int Randr_Notify_Event = xenium->randr_event_base + XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY;
2683
2684 xcb_generic_event_t* event = nullptr;
2685
2686 xenium->event_loop_is_running.store(true);
2687
2688 // Handle events and render window contents
2689 while(thread_token.stop_requested() == false)
2690 {
2691 // Process all events
2692 while(true)
2693 {
2694 event = xcb_poll_for_event(xenium->connection);
2695
2696 if(event == nullptr)
2697 {
2698 /*
2699 * No more events from the server, check if
2700 * there any remaining key events to process.
2701 */
2702 xenium->keyDataArrayProcess();
2703
2704 break;
2705 }
2706
2707 switch(event->response_type & 0x7f)
2708 {
2709 case XCB_CLIENT_MESSAGE:
2710 xenium->xcbEvent(
2711 (xcb_client_message_event_t*)event
2712 );
2713 break;
2714
2715 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_PRESS ------------ //
2716 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_RELEASE ---------- //
2717 case XCB_BUTTON_PRESS:
2718 [[fallthrough]];
2719 case XCB_BUTTON_RELEASE:
2720 xenium->xcbEvent(
2721 (xcb_button_press_event_t*)event
2722 );
2723 break;
2724
2725 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_ENTER_WINDOW ------------ //
2726 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_LEAVE_WINDOW ------------ //
2727 case XCB_ENTER_NOTIFY: [[fallthrough]];
2728 case XCB_LEAVE_NOTIFY:
2729 xenium->xcbEvent(
2730 (xcb_enter_notify_event_t*)event
2731 );
2732 break;
2733
2734 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_EXPOSURE ---------------- //
2735 case XCB_EXPOSE:
2736 xenium->xcbEvent(
2737 (xcb_expose_event_t*)event
2738 );
2739 break;
2740
2741 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_FOCUS_CHANGE ------------ //
2742 case XCB_FOCUS_IN: [[fallthrough]];
2743 case XCB_FOCUS_OUT:
2744 xenium->xcbEvent(
2745 (xcb_focus_in_event_t*)event
2746 );
2747 break;
2748
2749 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEY_PRESS --------------- //
2750 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEY_RELEASE ------------- //
2751 case XCB_KEY_PRESS: [[fallthrough]];
2752 case XCB_KEY_RELEASE:
2753 xenium->xcbEvent(
2754 (xcb_key_press_event_t*)event
2755 );
2756 break;
2757
2758 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_POINTER_MOTION ---------- //
2759 case XCB_MOTION_NOTIFY:
2760 xenium->xcbEvent(
2761 (xcb_motion_notify_event_t*)event
2762 );
2763 break;
2764
2765 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_PROPERTY_CHANGE --------- //
2766 case XCB_PROPERTY_NOTIFY:
2767 xenium->xcbEvent(
2768 (xcb_property_notify_event_t*)event
2769 );
2770 break;
2771
2772 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_STRUCTURE_NOTIFY -------- //
2773 case XCB_CONFIGURE_NOTIFY:
2774 xenium->xcbEvent(
2775 (xcb_configure_notify_event_t*)event
2776 );
2777 break;
2778
2779 case XCB_GRAVITY_NOTIFY:
2780 xenium->xcbEvent(
2781 (xcb_gravity_notify_event_t*)event
2782 );
2783 break;
2784
2785 case XCB_MAP_NOTIFY:
2786 xenium->xcbEvent(
2787 (xcb_map_notify_event_t*)event
2788 );
2789 break;
2790
2791 case XCB_REPARENT_NOTIFY:
2792 xenium->xcbEvent(
2793 (xcb_reparent_notify_event_t*)event
2794 );
2795 break;
2796
2797 case XCB_UNMAP_NOTIFY:
2798 xenium->xcbEvent(
2799 (xcb_unmap_notify_event_t*)event
2800 );
2801 break;
2802
2803 // --- Other Event Types ---------------------- //
2804 default:
2805 if(event->response_type == Randr_Notify_Event)
2806 {
2807 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "RandR Event: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
2808 xenium->randrEvent(
2809 (xcb_randr_notify_event_t*)event
2810 );
2811 }
2812 else
2813 {
2814 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Unknown Event: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
2815 }
2816
2817 // --- ------------------------------------ --- //
2818 // --- Unused event masks at this time --- //
2819 // --- ------------------------------------ --- //
2820 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_1_MOTION --------- //
2821 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_2_MOTION --------- //
2822 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_3_MOTION --------- //
2823 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_4_MOTION --------- //
2824 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_5_MOTION --------- //
2825 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_BUTTON_MOTION ----------- //
2826 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_COLOR_MAP_CHANGE -------- //
2827 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_KEYMAP_STATE ------------ //
2828 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_OWNER_GRAB_BUTTON ------- //
2829 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_POINTER_MOTION_HINT ----- //
2830 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_RESIZE_REDIRECT --------- //
2831 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY ----- //
2832 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT --- //
2833 // --- XCB_EVENT_MASK_VISIBILITY_CHANGE ------- //
2834 }
2835
2836 free(event);
2837 }
2838
2839 /*
2840 * All events are done, check if there are any windows to
2841 * create or destory.
2842 */
2843 xenium->xenium_window_mutex.lock();
2844 {
2845 for(Xenium::WindowCreateData* window_data : xenium->window_to_create)
2846 {
2847 xenium->xcbWindowCreate(window_data);
2848 window_data->barrier.set_value();
2849 }
2850
2851 xenium->window_to_create.clear();
2852
2853 for(Xenium::WindowDestroyData* window_data : xenium->window_to_destroy)
2854 {
2855 xenium->xcbWindowDestroy(window_data);
2856 window_data->barrier.set_value();
2857 }
2858
2859 xenium->window_to_destroy.clear();
2860 }
2861 xenium->xenium_window_mutex.unlock();
2862
2863 std::this_thread::yield();
2864 }
2865
2866 xenium->event_loop_is_running.store(false);
2867}
2868

2913Xenium::Output Xenium::output(const Xenium::OutputId output_id
2914 ) const noexcept
2915{
2916 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
2917
2918 if(output_map.contains(output_id) == false)
2919 {
2920 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG
2921 << "Invalid output_id: "
2922 << std::to_string(output_id)
2923 ;
2924
2925 return {};
2926 }
2927
2928 return output_map.at(output_id);
2929}

2941Xenium::VectorOutputId Xenium::outputVector() const noexcept
2942{

2944 vector.clear();
2945
2946 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
2947

2949 {
2950 vector.push_back(iter.first);
2951 }
2952
2953 return vector;
2954}

3279
3302const Xenium::Output& Xenium::output(const int16_t x
3303 , const int16_t y
3304 , OutputId& output_id
3305 ) noexcept
3306{
3307 for(const auto& iter : output_map)
3308 {
3309 const Output& output = iter.second;
3310
3311 if(x >= output.x
3312 && x < (output.x + output.width)
3313 && y >= output.y
3314 && y < (output.y + output.height)
3315 )
3316 {
3317 output_id = iter.first;
3318
3319 return output;
3320 }
3321 }
3322
3323 uint64_t distance = std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::max();
3324
3325 for(const auto& iter : output_map)
3326 {
3327 const Output& output = iter.second;
3328
3329 int64_t output_x = (std::abs(output.x) + output.width) / 2;
3330 int64_t output_y = (std::abs(output.y) + output.height) / 2;
3331
3332 uint64_t dist = std::abs(x - output_x) + std::abs(y - output_y);
3333
3334 if(dist < distance)
3335 {
3336 output_id = iter.first;
3337 }
3338 }
3339
3340 return output_map[output_id];
3341}
3342
3343
3352std::error_code Xenium::outputInit() noexcept
3353{
3354 xcb_generic_error_t* xcb_generic_error = nullptr;
3355
3356 xcb_randr_get_screen_resources_current_reply_t* screen_resources =
3357 xcb_randr_get_screen_resources_current_reply(this->connection
3358 , xcb_randr_get_screen_resources_current(this->connection
3359 , this->screen->root
3360 )
3361 , &xcb_generic_error
3362 );
3363
3364 if(screen_resources == nullptr)
3365 {
3366 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
3367 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Screen_Resources_Not_Found)
3368 );
3369
3370 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Screen_Resources_Not_Found);
3371 }
3372
3373 xcb_randr_output_t* output_list =
3374 xcb_randr_get_screen_resources_current_outputs(screen_resources
3375 );
3376
3377 int output_list_size =
3378 xcb_randr_get_screen_resources_current_outputs_length(screen_resources
3379 );
3380
3381# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED
3382 if(output_list_size == 0)
3383 {
3384 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG
3385 << "No outputs where found in the Screen Resources"
3386 ;
3387 }
3388# endif
3389
3390 for(int i = 0; i < output_list_size; i++)
3391 {
3392 xcb_randr_get_output_info_reply_t* output_info =
3393 xcb_randr_get_output_info_reply(this->connection
3394 , xcb_randr_get_output_info(this->connection
3395 , output_list[i]
3396 , screen_resources->config_timestamp
3397 )
3398 , &xcb_generic_error
3399 );
3400
3401 if(output_info == nullptr
3402 || output_info->connection != XCB_RANDR_CONNECTION_CONNECTED
3403 || output_info->crtc == XCB_NONE
3404 )
3405 {
3406 // Output Info is not usable
3407 free(output_info);
3408 continue;
3409 }
3410
3411 xcb_randr_get_crtc_info_reply_t* crtc_info =
3412 xcb_randr_get_crtc_info_reply(this->connection
3413 , xcb_randr_get_crtc_info(this->connection
3414 , output_info->crtc
3415 , screen_resources->config_timestamp
3416 )
3417 , &xcb_generic_error
3418 );
3419
3420 if(crtc_info == nullptr)
3421 {
3422 free(crtc_info);
3423 free(output_info);
3424 continue;
3425 }
3426
3427 // Some Virtual Machines do not fully populate the output
3428 // devices for X11. Calculate the `mm` size if it is missing.
3429 if(output_info->mm_width == 0 || output_info->mm_height == 0)
3430 {
3431 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
3432 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Output_Info_Is_Incomplete)
3433 );
3434
3435 const float pixels_per_mm_horizontal = (float)this->screen->width_in_pixels / this->screen->width_in_millimeters;
3436 const float pixels_per_mm_vertical = (float)this->screen->height_in_pixels / this->screen->height_in_millimeters;
3437
3438 output_info->mm_width = crtc_info->width / pixels_per_mm_horizontal;
3439 output_info->mm_height = crtc_info->height / pixels_per_mm_vertical;
3440 }
3441
3442 outputAdd(crtc_info, output_info);
3443
3444 free(crtc_info);
3445 free(output_info);
3446 }
3447
3448 free(screen_resources);
3449
3450 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
3451}

3742Xenium::Window* Xenium::windowCreate(const Xenium::SizeMm& size_mm
3743 , const uint32_t value_mask
3744 , xcb_create_window_value_list_t& value_list
3745 , std::error_code& error
3746 ) noexcept
3747{
3748 Xenium::WindowCreateData data =
3749 { .barrier = {}
3750 , .error = {}
3751 , .window_id = 0
3752 , .output_id = 0
3753 , .atom_close_request = 0
3754 , .gc = 0
3755 , .size_unit = Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter
3756 , .size_mm = size_mm
3757 , .size_percent = {}
3758 , .size_pixel = {}
3759 , .value_mask = value_mask
3760 , .value_list = value_list
3761 };
3762

3764
3765 windowCreateAddToQueue(&data);
3766
3767 barrier.wait();
3768
3769 if(data.error)
3770 {
3771 error = data.error;
3772
3773 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
3774
3775 return nullptr;

3777

3779

3781
3782 return window;
3783}

4080std::error_code Xenium::windowMinimize(const Xenium::WindowId window_id
4081 ) noexcept

4084 { .response_type = XCB_CLIENT_MESSAGE
4085 , .format = 32
4086 , .sequence = 0
4087 , .window = window_id
4088 , .type = atom_wm_change_state
4089 , .data = { }
4090 };
4091 event.data.data32[0] = XCB_ICCCM_WM_STATE_ICONIC;
4092
4093 xcb_send_event(this->connection
4094 , 0 // do not propagate
4095 , this->screen->root
4096 , XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT | XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY
4097 , (const char*)&event

4105
4115std::error_code Xenium::windowModeSet(const Xenium::WindowId window_id
4116 , const Xenium::WindowMode current_mode
4117 , const Xenium::WindowMode new_mode
4118 ) noexcept
4119{
4120 xcb_client_message_event_t event =
4121 { .response_type = XCB_CLIENT_MESSAGE
4122 , .format = 32
4123 , .sequence = 0
4124 , .window = window_id
4125 , .type = atom_net_wm_state
4126 , .data = { }
4127 };
4128
4129 if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Normal)
4130 {
4131 // Do nothing
4132 }
4133 else
4134 {
4135 event.data.data32[0] = _NET_WM_STATE_REMOVE;
4136
4137 if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Fullscreen)
4138 {
4139 event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen;
4140 event.data.data32[2] = 0;
4141 }
4142 else // if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Maximized)
4143 {
4144 event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz;
4145 event.data.data32[2] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert;
4146 }
4147
4148 xcb_send_event(this->connection
4149 , 0 // do not propagate
4150 , this->screen->root
4151 , XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT | XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY
4152 , (const char*)&event
4153 );
4154 }
4155
4156 if(new_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Normal)
4157 {
4158 // Do nothing
4159 }
4160 else
4161 {
4162 event.data.data32[0] = _NET_WM_STATE_ADD;
4163
4164 if(new_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Fullscreen)
4165 {
4166 event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen;
4167 event.data.data32[2] = 0;
4168 }
4169 else // if(current_mode == Xenium::WindowMode::Maximized)
4170 {
4171 event.data.data32[1] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz;
4172 event.data.data32[2] = atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert;
4173 }
4174
4175 xcb_send_event(this->connection
4176 , 0 // do not propagate
4177 , this->screen->root
4178 , XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_REDIRECT | XCB_EVENT_MASK_SUBSTRUCTURE_NOTIFY
4179 , (const char*)&event
4180 );
4181 }
4182
4183 xcb_flush(this->connection);
4184
4185 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
4186}

4274void Xenium::windowReadySet(const WindowId window_id
4275 ) noexcept
4276{
4277 window_ready_map[window_id] = true;
4278}
4279
4280
4290void Xenium::windowReadyWait(const WindowId window_id
4291 ) noexcept
4292{
4293 xcb_map_window(this->connection, window_id);
4294 xcb_flush(this->connection);
4295
4296 while(window_ready_map[window_id] == false)
4297 {
4298 usleep(42);
4299 }
4300}

4302
4309void Xenium::windowResizeTo(const Output& output
4310 , Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size
4311 , const xcb_configure_notify_event_t* event
4312 ) noexcept
4313{
4314 bool update_size = false;
4315
4316 if(window_size.unit == SizeUnit::Millimeter)
4317 {
4318 auto pixel = convertMmToPixel(output
4319 , window_size.mm.width
4320 , window_size.mm.height
4321 );
4322
4323 if(pixel.first != window_size.pixel.width
4324 || pixel.second != window_size.pixel.height
4325 )
4326 {
4327 update_size = true;
4328 }
4329
4330 window_size.pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4331
4332 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4333 , window_size.pixel.width
4334 , window_size.pixel.height
4335 );
4336 window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4337 }
4338 else if(window_size.unit == SizeUnit::Percent)
4339 {
4340 auto pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
4341 , window_size.percent.width
4342 , window_size.percent.height
4343 );
4344
4345 if(pixel.first != window_size.pixel.width
4346 || pixel.second != window_size.pixel.height
4347 )
4348 {
4349 update_size = true;
4350 window_size.pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4351 }
4352
4353 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4354 , window_size.pixel.width
4355 , window_size.pixel.height
4356 );
4357
4358 window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4359 }
4360 else
4361 {
4362 if(event->width != window_size.pixel.width
4363 || event->height != window_size.pixel.height
4364 )
4365 {
4366 update_size = true;
4367 }
4368
4369 window_size.pixel = {event->width, event->height};
4370
4371 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4372 , window_size.pixel.width
4373 , window_size.pixel.height
4374 );
4375 window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4376
4377 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4378 , window_size.pixel.width
4379 , window_size.pixel.height
4380 );
4381 window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4382 }
4383
4384 windowSizeSetMinMax(output, event->window, window_size);
4385
4386 if(update_size)
4387 {
4388 window_size.pixel_lambda(window_size.pixel);
4389 window_size.percent_lambda(window_size.percent);
4390 window_size.mm_lambda(window_size.mm);
4391
4392 windowSizeSet(event->window, window_size.pixel);
4393 }
4394}

4404std::error_code Xenium::windowSizeSet(const WindowId window_id
4405 , const Xenium::SizePixel& size
4406 ) noexcept
4407{
4408 xcb_configure_window_value_list_t value_list =
4409 { .x = 0
4410 , .y = 0
4411 , .width = (uint32_t)size.width
4412 , .height = (uint32_t)size.height
4413 , .border_width = 0
4414 , .sibling = 0
4415 , .stack_mode = 0
4416 };
4417
4418 xcb_void_cookie_t void_cookie =
4419 xcb_configure_window_aux_checked(this->connection
4420 , window_id
4421 , 0
4422 | XCB_CONFIG_WINDOW_WIDTH
4423 | XCB_CONFIG_WINDOW_HEIGHT
4424 , &value_list
4425 );
4426
4427 xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
4428 if(requestCheckHasError(void_cookie, generic_error))
4429 {
4430 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_VAR(to_string(generic_error));
4431
4432 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
4433 }
4434
4435 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
4436}

4438
4447std::error_code Xenium::windowSizeSetMinMax(const WindowId window_id
4448 , const int32_t min_width
4449 , const int32_t min_height
4450 , const int32_t max_width
4451 , const int32_t max_height
4452 ) noexcept
4453{
4454 xcb_get_property_cookie_t property_cookie =
4455 xcb_get_property(this->connection
4456 , 0 // delete
4457 , window_id // window
4458 , XCB_ATOM_WM_NORMAL_HINTS // property
4459 , XCB_ATOM_WM_SIZE_HINTS // type
4460 , 0 // offset to data (32-bit)
4461 , 18 // number of 32-bit values
4462 );
4463
4464 xcb_generic_error_t* error_ptr = nullptr;
4465 xcb_get_property_reply_t* property_reply =
4466 xcb_get_property_reply(this->connection
4467 , property_cookie
4468 , &error_ptr
4469 );
4470 if(error_ptr)
4471 {
4472 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(*error_ptr) << '\n';
4473
4474 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
4475 }
4476
4477 xcb_size_hints_t* size_hints =
4478 (xcb_size_hints_t*)xcb_get_property_value(property_reply);
4479
4480 if(min_width == 0 && min_height == 0)
4481 {
4482 size_hints->flags &= (~XCB_ICCCM_SIZE_HINT_P_MIN_SIZE);
4483 }
4484 else
4485 {
4486 size_hints->flags |= XCB_ICCCM_SIZE_HINT_P_MIN_SIZE;
4487 }
4488
4489 size_hints->min_width = min_width;
4490 size_hints->min_height = min_height;
4491
4492 if(max_width == 0 && max_height == 0)
4493 {
4494 size_hints->flags &= (~XCB_ICCCM_SIZE_HINT_P_MAX_SIZE);
4495 }
4496 else
4497 {
4498 size_hints->flags |= XCB_ICCCM_SIZE_HINT_P_MAX_SIZE;
4499 }
4500
4501 size_hints->max_width = max_width;
4502 size_hints->max_height = max_height;
4503
4504 xcb_void_cookie_t cookie =
4505 xcb_change_property_checked(this->connection
4506 , XCB_PROP_MODE_REPLACE
4507 , window_id
4508 , XCB_ATOM_WM_NORMAL_HINTS
4509 , XCB_ATOM_WM_SIZE_HINTS
4510 , 32 // 32-bit values
4511 , 18 // 18 values
4512 , size_hints
4513 );
4514
4515 xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
4516
4517 if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
4518 {
4519 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
4520
4521 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
4522 }
4523
4524 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
4525}

4565

4567 pixel = convertMmToPixel(output
4568 , window_size.mm_maximum.width
4569 , window_size.mm_maximum.height
4570 );

4572
4573 percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4574 , window_size.pixel_maximum.width
4575 , window_size.pixel_maximum.height
4576 );
4577 window_size.percent_maximum = {percent.first, percent.second};
4578 }
4579 else if(window_size.unit == SizeUnit::Percent)
4580 {
4581 // --- Window Minimum Size --- //
4582 auto pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
4583 , window_size.percent_minimum.width
4584 , window_size.percent_minimum.height
4585 );
4586 window_size.pixel_minimum = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4587
4588 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4589 , window_size.pixel_minimum.width
4590 , window_size.pixel_minimum.height
4591 );
4592 window_size.mm_minimum = {mm.first, mm.second};
4593
4594 // --- Window Maximum Size --- //
4595 pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
4596 , window_size.percent_maximum.width
4597 , window_size.percent_maximum.height
4598 );
4599 window_size.pixel_maximum = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
4600
4601 mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4602 , window_size.pixel_maximum.width
4603 , window_size.pixel_maximum.height
4604 );
4605 window_size.mm_maximum = {mm.first, mm.second};
4606 }
4607 else
4608 {
4609 // --- Window Minimum Size --- //
4610 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4611 , window_size.pixel_minimum.width
4612 , window_size.pixel_minimum.height
4613 );
4614 window_size.mm_minimum = {mm.first, mm.second};
4615
4616 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output

4618 , window_size.pixel_minimum.height

4631 , window_size.pixel_maximum.height
4632 );
4633 window_size.percent_maximum = {percent.first, percent.second};
4634 }
4635
4636 // --- Set Window Min/Max Size --- //
4637 std::error_code error;
4638
4639 error = windowSizeSetMinMax(window_id
4640 , window_size.pixel_minimum.width, window_size.pixel_minimum.height
4641 , window_size.pixel_maximum.width, window_size.pixel_maximum.height

4644# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED

4646 {

4648 }
4649# endif
4650
4651 return error;
4652}

4656
4660void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_button_press_event_t* event
4661 ) noexcept
4662{
4663//std::cout << "Button Press: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4664
4665 const WindowId window_id = event->event;
4666
4667 uint32_t button_code = event->detail;
4668
4669 if(button_code <= 3 || button_code >= 8)
4670 {
4671 if(button_code > 9)
4672 {
4673 button_code = 0;
4674 }
4675 else if(button_code >= 8)
4676 {
4677 button_code -= 5;
4678 }
4679 else
4680 {
4681 button_code--;
4682 }
4683
4684 PointerButton button =
4685 { .code = Pointer_Button_Event_Code[button_code]
4686 , .state = event->response_type == XCB_BUTTON_PRESS
4687 ? Xenium::PointerButtonState::Pressed
4688 : Xenium::PointerButtonState::Released
4689 };
4690
4691 OutputId output_id = window_output_map[window_id];
4692 Output output = output_map.at(output_id);
4693
4694 PointPixel point_pixel = {0, event->event_x, event->event_y};
4695
4696 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4697 , event->event_x
4698 , event->event_y
4699 );
4700 PointMm point_mm = {0, mm.first, mm.second};
4701
4702 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = window_size_map[window_id];
4703 PointPercent point_percent =
4704 { event->time
4705 , (float)event->event_x / (float)window_size.pixel.width
4706 , (float)event->event_y / (float)window_size.pixel.height
4707 };
4708
4709 window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_mm(button, point_mm, key_modifier);
4710 window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_percent(button, point_percent, key_modifier);
4711 window_on_button_map[window_id].lambda_pixel(button, point_pixel, key_modifier);
4712 }
4713 else if(event->response_type == XCB_BUTTON_PRESS)
4714 {
4715 if(button_code == 4 || button_code == 5)
4716 {
4717 PointerAxis pointer_axis =
4718 { .time = event->time
4719 , .steps = button_code == 4 ? -1 : 1
4720 , .distance = button_code == 4 ? -15.0f : 15.0f
4721 , .source = PointerAxisSource::Wheel
4722 , .type = PointerAxisType::Vertical
4723 };
4724
4725 window_on_axis_map[window_id](pointer_axis, key_modifier);
4726 }
4727 else if(button_code == 6 || button_code == 7)
4728 {
4729 PointerAxis pointer_axis =
4730 { .time = event->time
4731 , .steps = button_code == 6 ? -1 : 1
4732 , .distance = button_code == 6 ? -15.0f : 15.0f
4733 , .source = PointerAxisSource::Wheel
4734 , .type = PointerAxisType::Horizontal
4735 };
4736
4737 window_on_axis_map[window_id](pointer_axis, key_modifier);
4738 }
4739 }
4740}

4760
4784void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_configure_notify_event_t* event
4785 ) noexcept
4786{
4787//std::cout << "Configure Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4788 if((event->response_type & 0x80) == 0)
4789 {
4790 // Only care about events with the "synthetic bit" set
4791 return;
4792 }
4793
4794 const WindowId window_id = event->window;
4795
4796 auto iter = window_size_map.find(window_id);
4797
4798 if(iter == std::end(window_size_map))
4799 {
4800 return;
4801 }
4802
4803 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = iter->second;
4804
4805 OutputId output_id;
4806 const Output& output = this->output(event->x, event->y, output_id);
4807
4808 if(window_output_map[window_id] != output_id)
4809 {
4810 window_output_map[window_id] = output_id;
4811
4812 windowResizeTo(output, window_size, event);
4813
4814 return;
4815 }
4816
4817 if(window_size.pixel.width == event->width
4818 && window_size.pixel.height == event->height
4819 )
4820 {
4821 return;
4822 }
4823
4824 window_size.pixel = {event->width, event->height};
4825
4826 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4827 , window_size.pixel.width
4828 , window_size.pixel.height
4829 );
4830 window_size.mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
4831
4832 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
4833 , window_size.pixel.width
4834 , window_size.pixel.height
4835 );
4836 window_size.percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
4837
4838 window_size.pixel_lambda(window_size.pixel);
4839 window_size.percent_lambda(window_size.percent);
4840 window_size.mm_lambda(window_size.mm);
4841}

4851void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_enter_notify_event_t* event
4852 ) noexcept
4853{
4854//std::cout << "Enter Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4855
4856 const WindowId window_id = event->event;
4857
4858 if(event->response_type == XCB_LEAVE_NOTIFY)
4859 {
4860 window_on_leave_map[window_id]();
4861 window_keyboard[window_id].on_leave();
4862 return;
4863 }
4864
4865 xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4866
4867 OutputId output_id = window_output_map[window_id];
4868 Output output = output_map.at(output_id);
4869
4870 PointPixel point_pixel = {0, event->event_x, event->event_y};
4871
4872 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
4873 , event->event_x
4874 , event->event_y
4875 );
4876 PointMm point_mm = {0, mm.first, mm.second};
4877
4878 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = window_size_map[window_id];
4879 PointPercent point_percent =
4880 { 0
4881 , (float)event->event_x / (float)window_size.pixel.width
4882 , (float)event->event_y / (float)window_size.pixel.height
4883 };
4884
4885 window_on_enter_map[window_id].lambda_mm(point_mm, key_modifier);
4886 window_on_enter_map[window_id].lambda_percent(point_percent, key_modifier);
4887 window_on_enter_map[window_id].lambda_pixel(point_pixel, key_modifier);
4888
4889 window_keyboard[window_id].on_enter();
4890}

4936void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_gravity_notify_event_t* //event ///< The XCB Event
4937 ) noexcept

4941
4942
4970void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_key_press_event_t* event
4971 ) noexcept
4972{
4973//std::cout << "Key Press: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
4974
4975 uint32_t key_code = (uint32_t)event->detail - 8;
4976
4977 constexpr uint16_t CapsLock = 0b0000'0010'0000'0000;
4978 constexpr uint16_t NumLock = 0b0000'0001'0000'0000;
4979 constexpr uint16_t Alt_Left = 0b0000'0000'1000'0000;
4980 constexpr uint16_t Alt_Right = 0b0000'0000'0100'0000;
4981 constexpr uint16_t Control_Left = 0b0000'0000'0010'0000;
4982 constexpr uint16_t Control_Right = 0b0000'0000'0001'0000;
4983 constexpr uint16_t Meta_Left = 0b0000'0000'0000'1000;
4984 constexpr uint16_t Meta_Right = 0b0000'0000'0000'0100;
4985 constexpr uint16_t Shift_Left = 0b0000'0000'0000'0010;
4986 constexpr uint16_t Shift_Right = 0b0000'0000'0000'0001;
4987
4988 if(event->response_type == XCB_KEY_PRESS)
4989 {
4990 switch(key_code)
4991 {
4992 case KEY_CAPSLOCK:
4993 xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4994 xkb_modifier_pressed |= CapsLock;
4995 break;
4996
4997 case KEY_NUMLOCK:
4998 xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
4999 xkb_modifier_pressed |= NumLock;
5000 break;
5001
5002 case KEY_LEFTALT:
5003 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Alt_Left;
5004 break;
5005
5006 case KEY_RIGHTALT:
5007 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Alt_Right;
5008 break;
5009
5010 case KEY_LEFTCTRL:
5011 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Control_Left;
5012 break;
5013
5014 case KEY_RIGHTCTRL:
5015 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Control_Right;
5016 break;
5017
5018 case KEY_LEFTMETA:
5019 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Meta_Left;
5020 break;
5021
5022 case KEY_RIGHTMETA:
5023 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Meta_Right;
5024 break;
5025
5026 case KEY_LEFTSHIFT:
5027 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Shift_Left;
5028 break;
5029
5030 case KEY_RIGHTSHIFT:
5031 xkb_modifier_pressed |= Shift_Right;
5032 break;
5033 }
5034 }
5035 else
5036 {
5037 switch(key_code)
5038 {
5039 case KEY_CAPSLOCK:
5040 xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
5041 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~CapsLock);
5042 break;
5043
5044 case KEY_NUMLOCK:
5045 xkbIndicatorStateUpdate();
5046 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~NumLock);
5047 break;
5048
5049 case KEY_LEFTALT:
5050 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Alt_Left);
5051 break;
5052
5053 case KEY_RIGHTALT:
5054 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Alt_Right);
5055 break;
5056
5057 case KEY_LEFTCTRL:
5058 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Control_Left);
5059 break;
5060
5061 case KEY_RIGHTCTRL:
5062 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Control_Right);
5063 break;
5064
5065 case KEY_LEFTMETA:
5066 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Meta_Left);
5067 break;
5068
5069 case KEY_RIGHTMETA:
5070 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Meta_Right);
5071 break;
5072
5073 case KEY_LEFTSHIFT:
5074 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Shift_Left);
5075 break;
5076
5077 case KEY_RIGHTSHIFT:
5078 xkb_modifier_pressed &= (~Shift_Right);
5079 break;
5080 }
5081 }
5082
5083 key_modifier.pressed = 0;
5084
5085 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & CapsLock)
5086 {
5087 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_CapsLock;
5088 }
5089
5090 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & NumLock)
5091 {
5092 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_NumLock;
5093 }
5094
5095 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Alt_Left | Alt_Right))
5096 {
5097 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Alt;
5098 }
5099
5100 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Control_Left | Control_Right))
5101 {
5102 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Control;
5103 }
5104
5105 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Meta_Left | Meta_Right))
5106 {
5107 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Meta;
5108 }
5109
5110 if(xkb_modifier_pressed & (Shift_Left | Shift_Right))
5111 {
5112 key_modifier.pressed |= KeyModifier_Shift;
5113 }
5114
5115 const WindowId window_id = event->event;
5116
5117 key_data_array[key_code].window_id = window_id;
5118
5119 Key& key = key_data_array[key_code].key;
5120 key.code = key_code;
5121
5122 if(event->response_type == XCB_KEY_PRESS)
5123 {
5124 key_data_array[key_code].modifier = key_modifier;
5125
5126 if(key.time == event->time)
5127 {
5128 key.state = KeyState::Repeat;
5129 }
5130 else
5131 {
5132 key.time = event->time;
5133 key.state = KeyState::Pressed;
5134
5135 key_data_array[key_code].repeat_time =
5136 event->time + xkb_controls.repeat_delay_ms
5137 ;
5138
5139 window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_modifier);
5140 }
5141 }
5142 /* If another window is active and a key is pressed then the cursor is
5143 * moved into a Xenium window while the key remains pressed, it is
5144 * possible for the first key event to be recieved is the
5145 * XCB_KEY_RELEASE. This event must be ignored because there was no
5146 * precedding XCB_KEY_PRESS event. To identify the bad XCB_KEY_RELEASE
5147 * event from the good event, the key.time value will be `0` if the the
5148 * pressed event is missing. A non-`0` key.time value means there was
5149 * a preceding XCB_KEY_PRESS event.
5150 */
5151 else if(key.time != 0) // && (event->response_type == XCB_KEY_RELEASE)
5152 {
5153 key.time = event->time;
5154 key.state = KeyState::Released;
5155
5156 key_data_array[key_code].modifier = key_modifier;
5157 }
5158}

5165 ) noexcept
5166{
5167//std::cout << "Map Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
5168}

5170
5174void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_motion_notify_event_t* event
5175 ) noexcept
5176{
5177//std::cout << "Motion Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
5178
5179 const WindowId window_id = event->event;
5180
5181 OutputId output_id = window_output_map[window_id];
5182 Output output = output_map.at(output_id);
5183
5184 PointPixel point_pixel = {0, event->event_x, event->event_y};
5185
5186 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
5187 , event->event_x
5188 , event->event_y
5189 );
5190 PointMm point_mm = {0, mm.first, mm.second};
5191
5192 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = window_size_map[window_id];
5193 PointPercent point_percent =
5194 { 0
5195 , (float)event->event_x / (float)window_size.pixel.width
5196 , (float)event->event_y / (float)window_size.pixel.height
5197 };
5198
5199 window_on_motion_map[window_id].lambda_mm(point_mm, key_modifier);
5200 window_on_motion_map[window_id].lambda_percent(point_percent, key_modifier);
5201 window_on_motion_map[window_id].lambda_pixel(point_pixel, key_modifier);
5202}

5204
5208void Xenium::xcbEvent(const xcb_property_notify_event_t* event
5209 ) noexcept
5210{
5211//std::cout << "Property Notify: " << to_string(*event) << '\n';
5212
5213 xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
5214
5215 if(event->atom == atom_net_frame_extents)
5216 {
5217 std::vector<int32_t> atom_data = Xenium::atomValueData(event->window
5218 , atom_net_frame_extents
5219 , XCB_ATOM_CARDINAL
5220 , 4
5221 , generic_error
5222 );
5223
5224 struct
5225 {
5226 int32_t left;
5227 int32_t right;
5228 int32_t top;
5229 int32_t bottom;
5230 }
5231 frame_extents =
5232 { .left = atom_data[0]
5233 , .right = atom_data[1]
5234 , .top = atom_data[2]
5235 , .bottom = atom_data[3]
5236 };
5237
5238 WindowDecorationsData& window = window_decorations_map[event->window];
5239
5240 WindowDecorations window_decorations = window.window_decorations;
5241
5242 if(frame_extents.left == 0
5243 && frame_extents.right == 0
5244 && frame_extents.top == 0
5245 && frame_extents.bottom == 0
5246 )
5247 {
5248 window.window_decorations = WindowDecorations::Client_Side;
5249 }
5250 else
5251 {
5252 window.window_decorations = WindowDecorations::Server_Side;
5253 }
5254
5255 if(window.window_decorations != window_decorations)
5256 {
5257 window.lambda(window.window_decorations);
5258 }
5259
5260 return;
5261 }
5262
5263 if(event->atom == atom_net_wm_state)
5264 {
5265 std::vector<xcb_atom_t> value =
5266 atomValueAtom(event->window, event->atom, generic_error);
5267
5268 WindowMode new_window_mode = WindowMode::Normal;
5269
5270 if(zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz)
5271 && zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert)
5272 )
5273 {
5274 new_window_mode = WindowMode::Maximized;
5275 }
5276 else if(zakero::vectorContains(value, atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen))
5277 {
5278 new_window_mode = WindowMode::Fullscreen;
5279 }
5280
5281 if(window_mode_map.contains(event->window))
5282 {
5283 WindowModeData& data = window_mode_map[event->window];
5284 LambdaWindowMode lambda = LambdaWindowMode_DoNothing;
5285 if(data.window_mode != new_window_mode)
5286 {
5287 data.window_mode = new_window_mode;
5288 lambda = data.lambda;
5289 }
5290
5291 lambda(new_window_mode);
5292 }
5293
5294 return;
5295 }
5296}

5325void Xenium::xcbWindowCreate(Xenium::WindowCreateData* window_data
5326 ) noexcept
5327{
5328 window_data->error = xcbWindowCreateValidate(window_data);
5329 if(window_data->error)
5330 {
5331 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(window_data->error);
5332
5333 return;
5334 }
5335
5336 window_data->error = xcbWindowCreateClient(window_data);
5337 if(window_data->error)
5338 {
5339 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(window_data->error);
5340
5341 Xenium::WindowDestroyData data =
5342 { .barrier = {}
5343 , .window_id = window_data->window_id
5344 , .gc = window_data->gc
5345 };
5346
5347 xcbWindowDestroy(&data);
5348
5349 return;
5350 }
5351
5352 window_data->error = xcbWindowCreateInit(window_data);
5353 if(window_data->error)
5354 {
5355 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(window_data->error);
5356
5357 Xenium::WindowDestroyData data =
5358 { .barrier = {}
5359 , .window_id = window_data->window_id
5360 , .gc = window_data->gc
5361 };
5362
5363 xcbWindowDestroy(&data);
5364
5365 return;
5366 }
5367
5368 return;
5369}

5371
5379std::error_code Xenium::xcbWindowCreateValidate(Xenium::WindowCreateData* window_data
5380 ) noexcept
5381{
5382 window_data->output_id = output_map.begin()->first;
5383 Xenium::Output& output = output_map.begin()->second;
5384
5385 Xenium::SizePixel size_pixel;
5386
5387 if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
5388 {
5389 auto pixel = convertMmToPixel(output
5390 , window_data->size_mm.width
5391 , window_data->size_mm.height
5392 );
5393 size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
5394 }
5395 else if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Percent)
5396 {
5397 auto pixel = convertPercentToPixel(output
5398 , window_data->size_percent.width
5399 , window_data->size_percent.height
5400 );
5401 size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
5402 }
5403 else // if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Pixel)
5404 {
5405 size_pixel = window_data->size_pixel;
5406 }
5407
5408 if((size_pixel.width < Window_Size_Minimum)
5409 || (size_pixel.width < Window_Size_Minimum)
5410 )
5411 {
5412 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5413 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small)
5414 );
5415
5416 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
5417 }
5418
5419 if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter)
5420 {
5421 window_data->size_pixel = size_pixel;
5422
5423 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
5424 , window_data->size_pixel.width
5425 , window_data->size_pixel.height
5426 );
5427 window_data->size_percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
5428 }
5429 else if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Percent)
5430 {
5431 window_data->size_pixel = size_pixel;
5432
5433 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
5434 , window_data->size_pixel.width
5435 , window_data->size_pixel.height
5436 );
5437 window_data->size_mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
5438 }
5439 else // if(window_data->size_unit == Xenium::SizeUnit::Pixel)
5440 {
5441 auto mm = convertPixelToMm(output
5442 , window_data->size_pixel.width
5443 , window_data->size_pixel.height
5444 );
5445 window_data->size_mm = {mm.first, mm.second};
5446
5447 auto percent = convertPixelToPercent(output
5448 , window_data->size_pixel.width
5449 , window_data->size_pixel.height
5450 );
5451 window_data->size_percent = {percent.first, percent.second};
5452 }
5453
5454 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
5455}

5465std::error_code Xenium::xcbWindowCreateClient(Xenium::WindowCreateData* data
5466 ) noexcept
5467{
5468 data->window_id = xcb_generate_id(this->connection);
5469
5470 xcb_void_cookie_t cookie =
5471 xcb_create_window_aux_checked(this->connection
5472 , this->screen->root_depth // depth
5473 , data->window_id // requested id
5474 , this->screen->root // parent window id
5475 , 0, 0 // location x,y
5476 , data->size_pixel.width // width
5477 , data->size_pixel.height // height
5478 , 0 // border width
5479 , XCB_WINDOW_CLASS_INPUT_OUTPUT // "class"
5480 , this->screen->root_visual // visual
5481 , data->value_mask
5482 , &data->value_list
5483 );
5484
5485 xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
5486
5487 if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
5488 {
5489 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
5490
5491 data->window_id = 0;
5492
5493 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5494 }
5495
5496 data->atom_close_request = atomCreateDeleteWindow(data->window_id
5497 , generic_error
5498 );
5499
5500 if(data->atom_close_request == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5501 {
5502 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
5503
5504 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5505 }
5506
5507 xcb_size_hints_t size_hints =
5508 { .flags = 0
5509 , .x = 0
5510 , .y = 0
5511 , .width = 0
5512 , .height = 0
5513 , .min_width = 0
5514 , .min_height = 0
5515 , .max_width = 0
5516 , .max_height = 0
5517 , .width_inc = 0
5518 , .height_inc = 0
5519 , .min_aspect_num = 0
5520 , .min_aspect_den = 0
5521 , .max_aspect_num = 0
5522 , .max_aspect_den = 0
5523 , .base_width = 0
5524 , .base_height = 0
5525 , .win_gravity = 0
5526 };
5527
5528 xcb_change_property_checked(this->connection
5529 , XCB_PROP_MODE_REPLACE
5530 , data->window_id
5531 , XCB_ATOM_WM_NORMAL_HINTS
5532 , XCB_ATOM_WM_SIZE_HINTS
5533 , 32 // 32-bit values
5534 , 18 // 18 values
5535 , &size_hints
5536 );
5537
5538 if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
5539 {
5540 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
5541
5542 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5543 }
5544
5545 data->gc = xcb_generate_id(this->connection);
5546 cookie = xcb_create_gc_checked(this->connection
5547 , data->gc
5548 , data->window_id
5549 , 0
5550 , nullptr
5551 );
5552
5553 if(requestCheckHasError(cookie, generic_error))
5554 {
5555 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG << "Error: " << to_string(generic_error) << '\n';
5556
5557 data->gc = 0;
5558
5559 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Unknown);
5560 }
5561
5562 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
5563}

5694std::error_code Xenium::atomInit() noexcept
5695{
5696 auto cookie_motif_wm_hints = internAtomRequest("_MOTIF_WM_HINTS");
5697 auto cookie_net_frame_extents = internAtomRequest("_NET_FRAME_EXTENTS");
5698 auto cookie_net_wm_state = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE");
5699 auto cookie_net_wm_state_fullscreen = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN");
5700 auto cookie_net_wm_state_hidden = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_HIDDEN");
5701 auto cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_horz = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ");
5702 auto cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_vert = internAtomRequest("_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT");
5703 auto cookie_wm_change_state = internAtomRequest("WM_CHANGE_STATE");
5704 auto cookie_wm_delete_window = internAtomRequest("WM_DELETE_WINDOW");
5705 auto cookie_wm_protocols = internAtomRequest("WM_PROTOCOLS");
5706
5707 xcb_generic_error_t generic_error;
5708
5709 atom_motif_wm_hints = internAtomReply(cookie_motif_wm_hints , generic_error);
5710 atom_net_frame_extents = internAtomReply(cookie_net_frame_extents , generic_error);
5711 atom_net_wm_state = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state , generic_error);
5712 atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_fullscreen , generic_error);
5713 atom_net_wm_state_hidden = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_hidden , generic_error);
5714 atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_horz , generic_error);
5715 atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert = internAtomReply(cookie_net_wm_state_maximized_vert , generic_error);
5716 atom_wm_change_state = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_change_state , generic_error);
5717 atom_wm_delete_window = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_delete_window , generic_error);
5718 atom_wm_protocols = internAtomReply(cookie_wm_protocols , generic_error);
5719
5720 if(atom_wm_delete_window == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5721 {
5722 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5723 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_WM_Delete_Window_Not_Available)
5724 );
5725
5726 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_WM_Delete_Window_Not_Available);
5727 }
5728
5729 if(atom_wm_protocols == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5730 {
5731 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5732 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_WM_Protocols_Not_Available)
5733 );
5734
5735 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_WM_Protocols_Not_Available);
5736 }
5737
5738 if(atom_net_wm_state == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5739 {
5740 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5741 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_NETWM_State_Not_Available)
5742 );
5743
5744 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_NETWM_State_Not_Available);
5745 }
5746
5747 if(atom_net_wm_state_fullscreen == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5748 {
5749 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5750 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Fullscreen_Not_Available)
5751 );
5752
5753 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Fullscreen_Not_Available);
5754 }
5755
5756 if(atom_net_wm_state_hidden == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5757 {
5758 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
5759 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Hidden_Not_Available)
5760 );
5761
5762 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Hidden_Not_Available);
5763 }
5764
5765 if((atom_net_wm_state_maximized_horz == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5766 || (atom_net_wm_state_maximized_vert == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5767 )
5768 {

5770 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Maximized_Window_Not_Available)
5771 );
5772
5773 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Xcb_Maximized_Window_Not_Available);
5774 }
5775
5776 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
5777}

5824std::string Xenium::atomName(const xcb_atom_t atom
5825 ) noexcept
5826{
5827 if(atom == XCB_ATOM_NONE)
5828 {
5829 return "";
5830 }
5831
5832 xcb_get_atom_name_cookie_t cookie =
5833 xcb_get_atom_name(this->connection, atom);
5834
5835 xcb_generic_error_t* error = nullptr;
5836
5837 xcb_get_atom_name_reply_t* reply =
5838 xcb_get_atom_name_reply(this->connection
5839 , cookie
5840 , &error
5841 );
5842
5843 if(reply == nullptr)
5844 {
5845 return "";
5846 }
5847
5848 char* name = xcb_get_atom_name_name(reply);
5849
5850 std::string atom_name(name);
5851
5852 free(reply);
5853
5854 return atom_name;
5855}

5857
5870std::vector<xcb_atom_t> Xenium::atomValueAtom(const WindowId window_id
5871 , const xcb_atom_t property_atom
5872 , xcb_generic_error_t& generic_error
5873 ) noexcept
5874{
5875 xcb_get_property_cookie_t property_cookie =
5876 xcb_get_property(this->connection
5877 , 0 // Don't Delete
5878 , window_id
5879 , property_atom
5880 , XCB_ATOM_ATOM
5881 , 0 // Data Offset
5882 , 2 // Number of 32-bit values
5883 );
5884
5885 xcb_generic_error_t* error = nullptr;
5886
5887 xcb_get_property_reply_t* property =
5888 xcb_get_property_reply(this->connection
5889 , property_cookie
5890 , &error
5891 );
5892
5893 if(property == nullptr)
5894 {
5895 generic_error = *error;
5896
5897 return {};
5898 }
5899
5900 int length = xcb_get_property_value_length(property) / 4;
5901
5902 std::vector<xcb_atom_t> retval(length);
5903
5904 xcb_atom_t* value = (xcb_atom_t*)xcb_get_property_value(property);
5905
5906 for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)
5907 {
5908 retval[i] = value[i];
5909 }
5910
5911 free(property);
5912
5913 return retval;
5914}

5934std::vector<int32_t> Xenium::atomValueData(const WindowId window_id
5935 , const xcb_atom_t property_atom
5936 , const xcb_atom_t type
5937 , const size_t count
5938 , xcb_generic_error_t& generic_error
5939 ) noexcept
5940{
5941 xcb_get_property_cookie_t property_cookie =
5942 xcb_get_property(this->connection
5943 , 0 // Don't Delete
5944 , window_id
5945 , property_atom
5946 , type
5947 , 0 // Data Offset
5948 , count // Number of 32-bit values
5949 );
5950
5951 xcb_generic_error_t* error = nullptr;
5952
5953 xcb_get_property_reply_t* property =
5954 xcb_get_property_reply(this->connection
5955 , property_cookie
5956 , &error
5957 );
5958
5959 if(property == nullptr)
5960 {
5961 generic_error = *error;
5962
5963 return {};
5964 }
5965
5966 int length = xcb_get_property_value_length(property) / 4;
5967
5968 std::vector<int32_t> vector(length);
5969
5970 int32_t* value = (int32_t*)xcb_get_property_value(property);
5971
5972 for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)
5973 {
5974 vector[i] = value[i];
5975 }
5976
5977 free(property);
5978
5979 return vector;
5980}

6004 ) noexcept
6005{
6006 xcb_generic_error_t* error = nullptr;
6007

6009 xcb_intern_atom_reply(this->connection
6010 , xcb_intern_atom(this->connection
6011 // 0: Create if needed
6012 // 1: result XCB_ATOM_NONE if not exist
6013 , create_if_needed ? 0 : 1
6014 , atom_name.length()
6015 , atom_name.c_str()
6016 )
6017 , &error
6018 );
6019
6020 xcb_atom_t atom;
6021

6040 }
6041 else

6043 atom = atom_reply->atom;
6044 }

6047

6134
6143std::error_code Xenium::randrInit() noexcept
6144{
6145 const xcb_query_extension_reply_t* randr =
6146 xcb_get_extension_data(this->connection, &xcb_randr_id);
6147
6148 if(randr->present == 0)
6149 {
6150 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
6151 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Not_Available)
6152 );
6153
6154 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Not_Available);
6155 }
6156
6157 randr_error_base = randr->first_error;
6158 randr_event_base = randr->first_event;
6159
6160 xcb_generic_error_t* xcb_generic_error = nullptr;
6161
6162 xcb_randr_query_version_reply_t* randr_query_version =
6163 xcb_randr_query_version_reply(this->connection
6164 , xcb_randr_query_version(this->connection
6165 , std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max()
6166 , std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max()
6167 )
6168 , &xcb_generic_error
6169 );
6170
6171 randr_query_version_major = randr_query_version->major_version;
6172 randr_query_version_minor = randr_query_version->minor_version;
6173
6174 ZAKERO_FREE(randr_query_version);
6175
6176 if(randr_query_version_major < 1
6177 || (randr_query_version_major == 1
6178 && randr_query_version_minor < 1
6179 )
6180 )
6181 {
6182 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(
6183 ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Version_Too_Old)
6184 );
6185
6186 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_RandR_Version_Too_Old);
6187 }
6188
6189 xcb_randr_select_input(this->connection
6190 , this->screen->root
6191 , 0
6192 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_CRTC_CHANGE
6193 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_OUTPUT_CHANGE
6194 /* Might be of future use
6195 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_SCREEN_CHANGE
6196 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_OUTPUT_PROPERTY
6197 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_PROVIDER_CHANGE
6198 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_PROVIDER_PROPERTY
6199 | XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_MASK_RESOURCE_CHANGE
6200 */
6201 );
6202
6203 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
6204}
6205
6206
6210void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_crtc_change_t* event
6211 ) noexcept
6212{
6213//std::cout << "RandR CRTC Chang:" << *event << '\n';
6214 OutputId output_id = event->crtc;
6215
6216 if(this->screen->root != event->window
6217 || output_map.contains(output_id) == false
6218 )
6219 {
6220 return;
6221 }
6222
6223 Output& output = output_map[output_id];
6224
6225 if(output.x == event->x
6226 && output.y == event->y
6227 && output.width == event->width
6228 && output.height == event->height
6229 && output.transform == event->rotation
6230 )
6231 {
6232 return;
6233 }
6234
6235 output.x = event->x;
6236 output.y = event->y;
6237 output.width = event->width;
6238 output.height = event->height;
6239 output.transform = event->rotation;
6240
6241 output.pixels_per_mm_horizontal = (float)event->width / output.physical_width_mm;
6242 output.pixels_per_mm_vertical = (float)event->height / output.physical_height_mm;
6243
6244 output_on_change(output_id);
6245}
6246
6247
6251void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_output_change_t* event
6252 ) noexcept
6253{
6254//std::cout << "RandR Output Chg:" << *event << '\n';
6255
6256 if(this->screen->root != event->window)
6257 {
6258 return;
6259 }
6260
6261 OutputId output_id = event->crtc;
6262
6263 if(event->connection == XCB_RANDR_CONNECTION_DISCONNECTED)
6264 {
6265 if(output_map.contains(output_id))
6266 {
6267 output_on_remove(output_id);
6268 }
6269
6270 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
6271
6272 output_map.erase(output_id);
6273 }
6274 else if((event->connection == XCB_RANDR_CONNECTION_CONNECTED)
6275 || (output_map.contains(output_id) == false)
6276 )
6277 {
6278 std::error_code error;
6279 {
6280 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(output_mutex);
6281
6282 error = outputAdd(event->crtc, event->output);
6283 }
6284
6285 if(!error)
6286 {
6287 output_on_add(output_id);
6288 }
6289# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED
6290 else
6291 {
6292 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
6293 }
6294# endif
6295
6296 }
6297 else
6298 {
6299 Output& output = output_map[output_id];
6300
6301 if(output.subpixel != event->subpixel_order
6302 || output.transform != event->rotation
6303 )
6304 {
6305 output.subpixel = event->subpixel_order;
6306 output.transform = event->rotation;
6307
6308 output_on_change(output_id);
6309 }
6310 }
6311}
6312
6313
6320void Xenium::randrEvent(const xcb_randr_notify_event_t* event
6321 ) noexcept
6322{
6323 switch(event->subCode)
6324 {
6325 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_CRTC_CHANGE:
6326 randrEvent(&event->u.cc);
6327 break;
6328 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_OUTPUT_CHANGE:
6329 randrEvent(&event->u.oc);
6330 break;
6331 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_OUTPUT_PROPERTY:
6332 // Not Used
6333 break;
6334 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_PROVIDER_CHANGE:
6335 // Not Used
6336 break;
6337 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_PROVIDER_PROPERTY:
6338 // Not Used
6339 break;
6340 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_RESOURCE_CHANGE:
6341 // Not Used
6342 break;
6343 case XCB_RANDR_NOTIFY_LEASE:
6344 // Not Used
6345 break;
6346 default:
6347 fprintf(stderr, "Unhandled Sub-Event %d\n", event->subCode);
6348 }
6349}

6393
6401void Xenium::keyDataArrayClear() noexcept
6402{
6403 const auto time_now = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
6404
6405 for(auto& key_data : key_data_array)
6406 {
6407 Key& key = key_data.key;
6408
6409 if(key.time == 0)
6410 {
6411 continue;
6412 }
6413
6414 key.state = KeyState::Released;
6415 key.time = time_now;
6416
6417 const KeyModifier& modifier = key_data.modifier;
6418 const WindowId& window_id = key_data.window_id;
6419
6420 window_on_key_map[window_id](key, modifier);
6421
6422 key.time = 0;
6423 }
6424}
6425
6426
6435void Xenium::keyDataArrayProcess() noexcept
6436{
6437 for(auto& key_data : key_data_array)
6438 {
6439 Key& key = key_data.key;
6440
6441 if(key.time == 0)
6442 {
6443 continue;
6444 }
6445
6446 if(key.state == KeyState::Pressed)
6447 {
6448 key.state = KeyState::Repeat;
6449
6450 continue;
6451 }
6452
6453 const WindowId& window_id = key_data.window_id;
6454
6455 if(key.state == KeyState::Released)
6456 {
6457 window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_data.modifier);
6458 key.time = 0;
6459
6460 continue;
6461 }
6462
6463 auto& repeat_time = key_data.repeat_time;
6464
6465 const auto time_now = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
6466
6467 if(key.state == KeyState::Repeat
6468 && repeat_time < time_now
6469 )
6470 {
6471 window_on_key_map[window_id](key, key_modifier);
6472 key.time = repeat_time;
6473 repeat_time += xkb_controls.repeat_interval_ms;
6474
6475 continue;
6476 }
6477 }
6478}
6479
6480
6484void Xenium::xkbControlsUpdate() noexcept
6485{
6486 xcb_xkb_get_controls_reply_t* controls_reply =
6487 xcb_xkb_get_controls_reply(this->connection
6488 , xcb_xkb_get_controls(this->connection
6489 , XCB_XKB_ID_USE_CORE_KBD
6490 )
6491 , nullptr
6492 );
6493
6494 if(controls_reply == nullptr)
6495 {
6496 return;
6497 }
6498
6499 xkb_controls.repeat_delay_ms = controls_reply->repeatDelay;
6500 xkb_controls.repeat_interval_ms = controls_reply->repeatInterval;
6501
6502 free(controls_reply);
6503}
6504
6505
6509void Xenium::xkbIndicatorStateUpdate() noexcept
6510{
6511 xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state_reply_t* reply =
6512 xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state_reply(this->connection
6513 , xcb_xkb_get_indicator_state(this->connection
6514 , XCB_XKB_ID_USE_CORE_KBD
6515 )
6516 , nullptr
6517 );
6518
6519 if(reply == nullptr)
6520 {
6521 return;
6522 }
6523
6524 const uint32_t state = reply->state;
6525 const uint32_t caps_lock = KeyModifier_CapsLock;
6526 const uint32_t num_lock = KeyModifier_NumLock;
6527
6528 key_modifier.locked = 0
6529 | (bool(state & XCB_XKB_INDICATOR_STATE_CAPSLOCK) * caps_lock)
6530 | (bool(state & XCB_XKB_INDICATOR_STATE_NUMLOCK) * num_lock)
6531 ;
6532
6533 free(reply);
6534
6535 return;
6536}

6915std::error_code Xenium::Window::sizeSet(const Xenium::SizeMm& size
6916 ) noexcept
6917{
6918 std::lock_guard lock(xenium->output_mutex);
6919
6920 Output& output = xenium->output_map[xenium->window_output_map[window_id]];
6921
6922 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id];
6923 window_size.unit = SizeUnit::Millimeter;
6924
6925 auto pixel = xenium->convertMmToPixel(output
6926 , size.width
6927 , size.height
6928 );
6929
6930 if(pixel.first < Window_Size_Minimum
6931 || pixel.second < Window_Size_Minimum
6932 )
6933 {
6934 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
6935 }
6936
6937 if(pixel.first == window_size.pixel.width
6938 && pixel.second == window_size.pixel.height
6939 )
6940 {
6941 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
6942 }
6943
6944 SizePixel size_pixel = {pixel.first, pixel.second};
6945
6946 std::error_code error = xenium->windowSizeSet(window_id, size_pixel);
6947
6948# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED
6949 if(error)
6950 {
6951 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
6952 }
6953# endif
6954
6955 return error;
6956}

7041 )
7042 {
7043 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_Window_Size_Too_Small);
7044 }
7045
7046 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id];
7047 window_size.unit = Xenium::SizeUnit::Pixel;
7048
7049 if(window_size.pixel.width == size.width
7050 && window_size.pixel.height == size.height
7051 )
7052 {
7053 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
7054 }
7055
7056 std::error_code error = xenium->windowSizeSet(window_id, size);
7057
7058# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED
7059 if(error)
7060 {
7061 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
7062 }
7063# endif
7064
7065 return error;
7066}
7067
7068
7080std::error_code Xenium::Window::sizeSetMinMax(const Xenium::SizeMm& size_min
7081 , const Xenium::SizeMm& size_max
7082 ) noexcept
7083{
7084 std::error_code error;
7085
7086 error = validateMinMax<Xenium::SizeMm>(size_min, size_max);
7087 if(error)
7088 {
7089 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
7090
7091 return error;
7092 }
7093
7094 std::lock_guard lock(xenium->output_mutex);
7095
7096 Xenium::WindowSizeData& window_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id];
7097
7098 window_size.unit = Xenium::SizeUnit::Millimeter;
7099 window_size.mm_minimum = size_min;
7100 window_size.mm_maximum = size_max;
7101
7102 Output& output = xenium->output_map[xenium->window_output_map[window_id]];
7103
7104 error = xenium->windowSizeSetMinMax(output, window_id, window_size);
7105
7106# if ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ENABLED
7107 if(error)
7108 {
7109 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
7110 }
7111# endif
7112
7113 return error;
7114}
7115

7493
7504std::error_code Xenium::Window::windowModeSet(const Xenium::WindowMode window_mode
7505 ) noexcept
7506{
7507 Xenium::WindowModeData& data = xenium->window_mode_map[window_id];
7508
7509 if(data.window_mode == window_mode)
7510 {
7511 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
7512 }
7513
7514 std::error_code error = xenium->windowModeSet(window_id
7515 , data.window_mode // current window mode
7516 , window_mode // new window mode
7517 );
7518
7519 if(error)
7520 {
7521 ZAKERO_XENIUM__DEBUG_ERROR(error);
7522
7523 return error;
7524 }
7525
7526 data.window_mode = window_mode;
7527
7528 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
7529}

7941// {{{ Class Window : Rendering
7942
7979std::error_code Xenium::Window::imageNext(uint8_t*& image
7980 , Xenium::SizePixel& size
7981 ) noexcept
7982{
7983 if(frame_buffer)
7984 {
7985 free(frame_buffer);
7986 }
7987
7988 frame_buffer_size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id].pixel;
7989 frame_buffer_length = frame_buffer_size.width * frame_buffer_size.height * 4;
7990 frame_buffer = (uint8_t*)malloc(sizeof(uint8_t) * frame_buffer_length);
7991
7992 image = frame_buffer;
7993 size = frame_buffer_size;
7994
7995 return ZAKERO_XENIUM__ERROR(Error_None);
7996}
7997
7998
8005void Xenium::Window::imagePresent() noexcept
8006{
8007 /*
8008 Xenium::SizePixel size = xenium->window_size_map[window_id].pixel;
8009 if(size.width != frame_buffer_size.width
8010 || size.height != frame_buffer_size.height
8011 )
8012 {
8013 return;
8014 }
8015 */
8016
8017 xcb_put_image(xenium->connection
8018 , XCB_IMAGE_FORMAT_Z_PIXMAP
8019 , window_id
8020 , gc
8021 , frame_buffer_size.width
8022 , frame_buffer_size.height
8023 , 0
8024 , 0
8025 , 0
8026 , xenium->screen->root_depth
8027 , frame_buffer_length
8028 , frame_buffer
8029 );
8030
8031 frame_time = ZAKERO_STEADY_TIME_NOW(milliseconds);
8032}
8033
8034
8046uint32_t Xenium::Window::time() const noexcept
8047{
8048 return frame_time;
8049}
8050
8051
8060uint8_t Xenium::Window::bytesPerPixel() const noexcept
8061{
8062 return 4; // ARGB8888
8063}

8627
8636std::string to_string(const Xenium::KeyModifier& key_modifier
8637 ) noexcept
8638{
8639 auto mod_to_str = [](std::string& s, uint32_t m)
8640 {
8641 s += "[";
8642 std::string delim = "";
8643
8644 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Shift)
8645 {
8646 s += delim + "\"Shift\"";
8647 delim = ",";
8648 }
8649
8650 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_CapsLock)
8651 {
8652 s += delim + "\"CapsLock\"";
8653 delim = ",";
8654 }
8655
8656 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Control)
8657 {
8658 s += delim + "\"Control\"";
8659 delim = ",";
8660 }
8661
8662 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Alt)
8663 {
8664 s += delim + "\"Alt\"";
8665 delim = ",";
8666 }
8667
8668 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_Meta)
8669 {
8670 s += delim + "\"Meta\"";
8671 }
8672
8673 if(m & Xenium::KeyModifier_NumLock)
8674 {
8675 s += delim + "\"NumLock\"";
8676 }
8677
8678 s += "]";
8679 };
8680
8681 std::string str = "{ \"pressed\": ";
8682 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.pressed);
8683
8684 str += ", \"latched\": ";
8685 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.latched);
8686
8687 str += ", \"locked\": ";
8688 mod_to_str(str, key_modifier.locked);
8689
8690 str += " }";
8691
8692 return str;
8693}

8709 case Xenium::KeyState::Released: return "Released";
8710 case Xenium::KeyState::Repeat: return "Repeat";
8711 default: return "";
8712 }
8713}
